channel.title: NPU-T Members Group
channel.description: Neighborhood Planning Unit "T" (NPU-T) is a citizen advisory council in Southwest Atlanta that makes recommendations to the Mayor and City Council on zoning, land use, and other planning issues.

item.title: NPU-T: Meeting Reminder! Location Change!
item.description: April 8th NPU-T General Body Meeting will be at the Hammonds House Museum, located at 503 Peeples St SW, 30310. item.title: New Meeting Location NPU-T in April
item.description: Please note that April's NPU-T General Body Meeting will be at the Hammonds House Museum, 503 Peeples St SW, 30310. There is plenty of parking in the rear and the meeting will begin at 7pm sharp. The change is due to APS's spring break schedule, meetings will resume being held at Kipp in May.
item.author: Mr. Terry Ross

item.title: NPU-T: The Future of Fire Station #17
item.description: Announcement from the Westview Community: Neighbors, Historic Fire Station #17 at the corner of Ralph David Abernathy Blvd and Cascade Ave will be getting a much needed renovation! The fire station was built in 1920 and served our neighborhood and the surrounding area for almost 60 years. In
item.author: Nia Knowles
